entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain or snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain late in the morning. Fog patches developing near noon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 50 gusting to 80 in the morning then southwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to periods of drizzle and ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023
